comments.body:
@charris you removed our cblas header, so we are now relying on the system always providing one?
fine with me as I only use sane systems but is it the case for all the crazy platforms people use numpy on?

Yeah, I thought about that. In the end, my thinking was that if there was a cblas, there had to be a cblas header somewhere. If not, we could deal with it when it became a problem. The original was pretty old and I have no idea what motivated the inclusion of cblas.h.
